verse.name: o1
verse.lines:
You were broken
You bled from You hands and feet
Gracious Savior
You died for me

verse.name: o2
verse.lines:
I’m forgiven, this blessed Salvation
Thank you Jesus, my invitation

verse.name: o3
verse.lines:
You are the table of Mercy
You are the Feast of Forgiveness
Let us sit down and taste the You are Good
You are Good

verse.name: o4
verse.lines:
I am broken
I don’t deserve You
I am nothing, You are
King of Kings

verse.name: o5
verse.lines:
Lord please help me
Lord please help me hear You
You are everything
Everything

verse.name: o6
verse.lines:
Holy Lover Faithful Master
Amazing Healer King of Kings
Jealous Father Heaven’s Keeper
Gracious Savior Everything
